sinks.name: Predict
sinks.reason: Output buffer pointer or destination for writes may be shared with Normal World, causing unencrypted data exposure and possible overflow if size checks are missing

sinks.name: Predict
sinks.reason: Input buffer pointer from Normal World; if used with memory operations without validation, can lead to out-of-bounds reads and taint propagation into sensitive operations

sinks.name: Predict
sinks.reason: Input size/length used in memory copy or processing; if unchecked, can cause buffer overflows or OOB access

sinks.name: Predict
sinks.reason: Output buffer size/length used for writes; if unchecked or mismatched with actual buffer, can cause overflows or data truncation/leakage

sinks.name: TEE_GenerateRandom
sinks.reason: Writes random bytes to caller-provided destination buffer which may point to shared or invalid memory, enabling data exposure or memory corruption if tainted

sinks.name: TEE_GenerateRandom
sinks.reason: Size controls how many bytes are written; tainted or unchecked size can cause out-of-bounds writes into the destination buffer

sinks.name: TEE_Malloc
sinks.reason: Tainted size can cause undersized or oversized allocation leading to buffer overflows, OOB access, or DoS in subsequent operations

sinks.name: TrainBatch
sinks.reason: Writes data to caller-provided buffer that may reside in shared memory, risking unencrypted exposure to the Normal World

sinks.name: TrainBatch
sinks.reason: Tainted size controls memory copy length; missing validation can cause OOB read/write or memory corruption

sinks.name: TrainBatch
sinks.reason: Destination buffer may be Normal World shared memory; writing sensitive data risks leakage

sinks.name: __LO
sinks.reason: Tainted format string can cause memory disclosure or unintended reads; output may reach Normal World

sinks.name: __LO
sinks.reason: Tainted data emitted to logs/output potentially visible to Normal World

sinks.name: __LO
sinks.reason: Tainted size can cause over-read/over-write or excessive exposure to Normal World
